Letter and Gift to Kim Jong Il from Mayor of Fristak 
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a letter and a gift by Lubomir Dolezel, mayor of Fristak of the Czech Republic.
 The letter and gift were conveyed to the head of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Art Troupe on a visit to the Czech Republic by the mayor on May 31.

articles.title: Equatorial Guinean President Supports DPRK Government's Stand
articles.content:
May 17 Joint Statement of Chongryon and Mindan Supported by Swiss Organization 
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on May 29 in support of the May 17 joint statement of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and the south Korean Residents Association in Japan (Mindan).
 The statement said that at the talks the delegates of Chongryon and Mindan agreed to convert the relations of antagonism and confrontation of several decades into the relations of reconciliation and concord in the idea of "By our nation itself", the basic spirit of the June 15 joint declaration, which conforms with the trend of history advancing toward national unity and reunification.    
 The statement noted that they fully supported the May 17 joint statement of Chongryon and Mindan with great joy, considering it a success made in the efforts for reconciliation and concord between the organizations of Koreans in Japan.

articles.content:
Equatorial Guinean President Supports DPRK Government's Stand 
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Equatorial Guinean President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, when receiving the DPRK ambassador to his country on June 1, expressed solid support to the just stand and earnest efforts of the government and people of the DPRK to reunify the country by the Korean nation itself without foreign interference.
 He would always remember the time when he visited the DPRK and met with President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he noted, referring to the invariable development of good relations of friendship and cooperation between Equatorial Guinea and the DPRK.

Participants in Pyongyang International Book Fair Feted 
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Organizing Committee of the 5th Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair and the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries gave a reception for the participants in the fair at the People's Palace of Culture Sunday.
 The delegations and delegates to the fair were present on invitation.    
 On hand were Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Thae Bok, acting Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Mun Jae Chol who is chairman of the organizing committee of the fair and others.
 Speeches were made at the reception.

DPRK Orders and Medal Awarded to Foreigners
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A ceremony for awarding DPRK orders and medals to foreigners who are visiting the DPRK to participate in the 5th Pyongyang International Science and Technology Book Fair was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on June 3.
 Present at the ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Jon Hyon Chan, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is vice-chairman of the organizing committee of the fair, officials concerned and members of foreign delegations.    
 Friendship Order Second Class was awarded to Gennadi Turmov, president of Far-Eastern State University of Technology, Valery Dikarev, vice-president of Far Eastern National University of Russia, and Zhu Yiming, general manager of the Songhuajiang Commercial Ltd. Company in Jilin Province, China, and Friendship Medal to Maurice Kwong Springer, Asian regional delegate of Science and Business Media. They made a positive contribution to helping the fair to open successfully and donated many valuable scientific and technological books and data for scientific and technological development of the DPRK.
